name: Attack
note:
Skill #1 will be used when you select
the Attack command.

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

description: Makes an attack that ignores enemy defenses.
name: For My Country!

description: Protect an ally from all damage until next turn.
name: Protect

description: Heals an ally for 33% of their max HP.
name: Bandage

description: Attempts to steal some gold while attacking.
name: Mug

description: Prepares to counter-attack all attacks for 1 turn.
name: Parry

message1: fires a hidden gun! That scoundrel...
name: Quick Shot

description: Raises chance to dodge for 3 turns.
name: Swashbuckler

description: Try to talk your way out of it.
name: Steal Heart

description: Makes a strong attack with a chance to steal an item.
name: Assault & Battery

description: Prepare to deal double damage next turn.
name: Focus

description: A difficult to land, but powerful shot.
name: Skilled Shot

description: Coerce some gold out of the enemy.
name: Threaten

description: Increase party ATK and M.ATK for 2 turns.
name: Encourage

description: Raise party DEF and MDEF for 2 turns.
name: Bolster Allies

description: Reduce enemy ATK value for 5 turns.
name: Weaken

description: Causes target to become filled with rage.
name: Antagonize

description: Causes enemy to do your bidding.
name: Control

description: Attacks and attempts to steal a some gold.
name: Spoils of War

description: Jumps into the air to drop down on an enemy.
name: Leap Attack

description: Raises party ATK/DEF for 10 turns and become immune to death for 5 turns.
name: Dragon Heart

description: Increases attack power, but attacks uncontrollably for 10 turns.
name: Berserk

description: Infuses Darkness in the weapon to attack. May blind the target.
name: Dark Blade

description: Raise party ATK & MAG for 15 turns.
name: Dark Knight

description: Attacks all enemies with Dark magic.
name: Darken All

description: Deal Dark physical damage to all enemies at the cost of HP.
name: Dark Wave

description: A massive physical attack infused with dark energies.
name: Execute

description: Raise party DEF & MDEF for 15 turns.
name: Leadership

description: Protect an ally from being attacked.
name: Defend

description: Raise party Fire/Ice/Shock resistance for 15 turns.
name: Elemental Defense

description: Raise party Water/Earth/Wind resistance for 15 turns.
name: Nature's Defense

description: Deals light damage while healing oneself.
name: Holy Strike & Heal

description: Heals an ally and cures minor afflictions.
name: Sacred Heal

description: Increases party DEF & Dark defense for 10 turns.
name: Divine Protection

description: Reduce all enemy ATK for 10 turns.
name: Prick Muscles

description: All enemies fight for you for a short time.
name: Puppeteer

description: Infuses Light in the weapon to attack. Heals a bit.
name: Light Blade

description: Raise party DEF & MDEF for 15 turns.
name: White Knight

description: Attacks all enemies with Light magic.
name: Lighten All

description: Deal Light physical damage to all enemies at the cost of HP.
name: Light Wave

description: A massive physical attack infused with Light power.
name: Sentence

description: Drains one enemy HP with Dark magic.
name: Drain Health

description: Deals damage and reduces enemy DEF/MDEF for 10 turns.
name: Curse

description: Drains all enemy HP with Dark magic.
name: Drain All

description: A grand Dark spell with a chance to cause random effects.
name: Forbidden Spell
